messages.subject: balancing self-preservation w/relationships
messages.msgSnippet: our lives are all full, it is a busy season when we have young children.  our marriage relationships are sooo important, too.  we are all in need of attention
messages.messageBody:
our lives are all full, it is a busy season when we have young children. our
marriage relationships are sooo important, too. we are all in need of
attention sometimes and luckily many women are able to intuit who needs it
most when. we need to include ourselves in that, but of course not at the
expense of other important relationships. self-preservation is a worthy
cause i am dedicated to!! however, ensuring that others in my imm. fam. are
always aware of their worth and how valuable they are is right up there, too.

erin
